A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just sad....Rian Johnson’s effort to be different is at the expense of the characters and the story. Rey’s parentage and Snoke’s origin are thrown away. New characters and side stories are useless\, lots of people die for no reason and Luke is wasted and his legacy is pissed on. The visuals and battles look great\, which makes it hurt more because this movie could have been SO MUCH BETTER. This movie makes the same mistakes with its characters and story that DC has made with its recent attempt at an Expanded Universe
